name: Daze
effects: Stuns nearby enemies for 0.5 seconds, then reduces their movement speed for 1 second.

name: Endure
effects: Immobilizes your hero to become invulnerable for 1.5 seconds.

name: Execute
effects: Instantly attacks a nearby enemy hero and deals damage equal to 16% of the HP the enemy hero has lost as true damage.

name: Flicker
effects: Teleports your hero over a short distance.

name: Heal
effects: You and nearby teammates instantly recover 15% HP and gain 15% movement speed for 2 seconds.

name: Punish
effects: Deals 800 true damage to nearby minions and monsters and stuns them for 1 second.

name: Purify
effects: Removes all debuffs and control effects on yourself and gains immunity to them for 1.5 seconds.

name: Roar
effects: Increases attack speed by 60% and attack damage by 10% for 5 seconds.
